# addTransformRamp(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets a transform ramp to apply during a given time range.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func addTransformRamp(_ ramp: AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction.TransformRamp)
```

## Configuring the transform

- **setTransform(_:at:)**: Sets the transform value at a time within the time range of the instruction.
- **transformRamp(at:)**: Obtains the transform ramp that includes a specified time.
